languages.text: "Предупреждение", {n}— усмехается мужчина.{/n} "Мой брат, брат Сумерки, сказал что у руля династии фон Валанциус встал ложный Вольный Торговец, и что он{mf||а} — враг, и может доставить проблемы".

traits.locale_text: "Предупреждение", {n}— усмехается мужчина.{/n} "Мой брат, брат Сумерки, сказал что у руля династии фон Валанциус встал ложный Вольный Торговец, и что он{mf||а} — враг, и может доставить проблемы".

languages.text: "A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that a false Rogue Trader had taken the helm of House von Valancius, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."
languages.original_text: "Предупреждение", {n}— усмехается мужчина.{/n} "Мой брат, брат Сумерки, сказал что у руля династии фон Валанциус встал ложный Вольный Торговец, и что он{mf||а} — враг, и может доставить проблемы".

traits.locale_text: "A warning," {n}he chuckles.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that House von Valancius had a new ruler who was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."
"A warning," {n}he chuckles.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that House von Valancius had a new ruler who was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."
"A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that House von Valancius had a new head, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."
"A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that House von Valancius had a new head, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."

"A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that a false Rogue Trader had taken the helm of House von Valancius, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."

languages.text: “是个警告。”{n}他笑着说道。{/n}“我的兄弟‘暮光’警告我，说有个假冒的行商浪人篡夺了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的王位。{mf|他|她}是我们的敌人，可能会给我们带来麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that a false Rogue Trader had taken the helm of House von Valancius, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."

traits.locale_text: “是个警告。”{n}他笑着说道。{/n}“我的兄弟‘暮光’警告我，说冯·瓦兰修斯家族有了新的领导人。{mf|他|她}是我们的敌人，可能会给我们带来麻烦。”

languages.text: "Es war eine Warnung", {n}sagt er grinsend.{/n} "Mein Bruder, Bruder Zwielicht, informierte mich, dass neuerdings {mf|ein falscher Freihändler|eine falsche Freihändlerin} Haus von Valancius anführt, {mf|der|die} uns feindlich gesonnen ist und potenziellen Ärger darstellt."
languages.original_text: "A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that a false Rogue Trader had taken the helm of House von Valancius, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Es war eine Warnung", {n}sagt er grinsend.{/n} "Mein Bruder, Bruder Zwielicht, informierte mich, dass das Haus von Valancius {mf|einen neuen Anführer hat, der|eine neue Anführerin hat, die} uns feindlich gesonnen ist und potenziellen Ärger darstellt."

languages.text: « Un avertissement, {n}répond-il avec un sourire en coin.{/n} Mon frère, frère Crépuscule, m'a informé qu'{mf|un imposteur|une imposteure} avait pris la tête de la maison von Valancius, qu'{mf|il|elle} était notre {mf|ennemi|ennemie} et une source d'ennuis potentielle. »
languages.original_text: "A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that a false Rogue Trader had taken the helm of House von Valancius, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."

traits.locale_text: « Un avertissement, {n}répond-il avec un sourire en coin.{/n} Mon frère, Frère Crépuscule, m'a informé que la maison von Valancius avait {mf|un nouveau|une nouvelle} chef, qu'{mf|il|elle} était notre {mf|ennemi|ennemie} et une source d'ennuis potentielle. »

languages.text: 「警告だ」と、{n}男はニヤリと笑って言う。{/n}「我が同志、薄明の兄弟から、偽の自由開拓者がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の実権を握っているとの情報が入った。{mf|彼|彼女}は敵であり、災いの種だと教えてくれたのだ」
languages.original_text: "A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that a false Rogue Trader had taken the helm of House von Valancius, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「警告だ」と、{n}男はニヤリと笑って言う。{/n}「我が同志、薄明の兄弟から、偽のローグトレーダーがフォン・ヴァランシウス家の実権を握っているとの情報が入った。そいつは敵だ。問題の種になり得るとか」
「警告だ」と、{n}男はニヤリと笑って言う。{/n}「我が同志、薄明の兄弟から、偽の自由開拓者がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の実権を握っているとの情報が入った。{mf|彼|彼女}は敵であり、災いの種だと教えてくれたのだ」

languages.text: «Una advertencia», {n}dice con una sonrisa de superioridad.{/n} «Mi hermano, el hermano Ocaso, me informó de un{mf| falso|a falsa} Comerciante Independiente se había apoderado de la casa von Valancius, y que era un{mf| enemigo|a enemiga} y una posible fuente de problemas».
languages.original_text: "A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that a false Rogue Trader had taken the helm of House von Valancius, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."

traits.locale_text: «Una advertencia», {n}dice con una sonrisa de superioridad.{/n} «Mi hermano, el hermano Ocaso, me informó de que la casa von Valancius tenía un{mf| nuevo|a nueva} líder, y que era un{mf| enemigo|a enemiga} y una posible fuente de problemas».

languages.text: "Bir uyarıydı." {n}Ağzından sözcükler çıkarken sırıtıyor.{/n} "Kardeşim, Rahip Seher, von Valancius Hanesi'nin başına sahte bir Hür Tacir'in geçtiğini, kendisinin bir düşman olduğunu ve muhtemelen sıkıntı yaratacağını söyledi."
languages.original_text: "A warning," {n}he says with a smirk.{/n} "My brother, Brother Twilight, informed me that a false Rogue Trader had taken the helm of House von Valancius, and that {mf|he|she} was an enemy and a potential source of trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Bir uyarıydı," {n}diyor sırıtarak.{/n} "Kardeşim, Rahip Seher, von Valancius Hanesi'nin başına sahte bir Hür Tacir'in geçtiğini, kendisinin bir düşman olduğunu ve muhtemelen sıkıntı yaratacağını söyledi."
